title: [CRASH] Redis 6.2.6 crashed by signal: 11, si_code: 1
body:
Hi, I am using redis for my project but it crashes 3 or 4 time a day. After restart the redis docker then it work fine the same data so i dont really know what happen here.
```
=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===
```

unless... are you by any chance using docker on Apple M1?
